data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dos Santos, Alana C., Cavichioli, Rodney R., Takiya, Daniela M., Mejdalani, Gabriel (2018): Juliaca Melichar, 1926 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Cicadellini): description of a new species from Southeastern Brazil and redescriptions of J. sertigerula (Jacobi, 1905) and J. xanthogramma (Signoret, 1854) comb. nov. Zootaxa 4472 (1): 165-175, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.1.9|16 occurrences
